description: McKay-Thompson series of class 7B for the Monster group.

Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Expansion of (eta(q) / eta(q^7))^4 + 4 in powers of q.
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = (QP[q]/QP[q^7])^4 + 4*q + O[q]^50; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 15 2015 *)
